mapper.select: select a.animal_type as animalType, count(b.pat_id) as animalCnt from animal a left outer join patient b on a.animal_cd = b.animal_cd group by a.animal_type

select a.animal_type as animalType, nvl(b.praCnt, 0) as praCnt from animal a left outer join (select b.animal_cd, count(c.pra_cd) as praCnt from patient b, pra c where b.pat_id = c.pat_id and c.pra_date between to_date(#{startDate}) and to_date(#{endDate}) group by b.animal_cd) b on a.animal_cd = b.animal_cd

select sum(pay_total) as payTotal, to_char(pay_date, 'yyyy/MM/dd') as payDate from payment where pay_date between to_date(#{startDate}) and to_date(#{endDate}) group by to_char(pay_date, 'yyyy/MM/dd') order by payDate

select count(pra_cd) as praCnt, to_char(pra_date, 'yyyy/MM/dd') as praDate from pra where pra_date between to_date(#{startDate}) and to_date(#{endDate}) group by to_char(pra_date, 'yyyy/MM/dd') order by praDate

select * from( select substr(b.item_name,0,6) as itemName, count(a.pre_nm) as drugCnt from pre_in a, drug b, PRA C where a.drug_nm = b.drug_nm AND A.PRA_CD = C.PRA_CD AND C.PRA_DATE between to_date(#{startDate}) and to_date(#{endDate}) group by b.item_name order by drugCnt desc ) where rownum between 1 and 10

select a.emp_name empName, count(b.pra_cd) as praCnt from employees a left outer join pra b on b.emp_id = a.emp_id and b.pra_date between to_date(#{startDate}) and to_date(#{endDate}) where a.emp_job = '의사' and a.emp_state = '재직중' group by a.emp_name order by praCnt desc
